          <div class="bi_video">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search PubMed for Article Abstracts
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_7" id="content10335761">
          <div id="boxatt10335761" class="boxatt">
           <div class="embedclass">
            <form method="get" action="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query.fcgi" target="new">
             <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query.fcgi?db=pubmed">
             </a>
             <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query.fcgi?db=pubmed">
              <img alt="PubMed Logo" src="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/corehtml/query/static/gifs/iconmed.gif" />
             </a>
             &nbsp;&nbsp;
             <input type="hidden" name="db" value="PubMed" />
             <input type="hidden" name="holding" value="paumbrlib" />
             <input name="term" size="20" type="TEXT" value="" />
             <input type="submit" value="Search" />
            </form>
           </div>
          </div>

       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21303547">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21303547">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21303547">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Host and Microbe Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21303547">
          <div id="boxatt21303547" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24807895">
              <a id="link_24807895" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=FCP&amp;J=CEHOM&amp;P=EJP&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cell.com%2Fcell-host-microbe%2Farchive" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24807895,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24807895}); ">
               Cell Host and Microbe
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Articles emphasize interface between the microbe and its host - available 2007- 1 year ago.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025702">
              <a id="link_25025702" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=aph&amp;rft.oclcnum=224543374&amp;issn=1462-5814&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=ETA&amp;provider=EBSCOhost&amp;title=Cellular+Microbiology&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=ebscoh&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fsearch.ebscohost.com%2Fdirect.asp%3Fdb%3Daph%26jid%3DETA%26scope%3Dsite&amp;dbKey=aph&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025702,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025702}); ">
               Cellular Microbiology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24807900">
              <a id="link_24807900" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=RPM&amp;J=INFEANDIMP&amp;P=EJP&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Fjournals%2F87%2F" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24807900,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24807900}); ">
               Infection and Immunity
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Articles focus on the underlying mechanisms of host-pathogen interactions and novel strategies to prevent or treat infectious diseases. Available 1970-6 months ago.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025697">
              <a id="link_25025697" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=openAccess&amp;rft.oclcnum=5842600990&amp;issn=1751-7362&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=ismej&amp;provider=NPG&amp;date=2010&amp;title=ISME+Journal%2C+The&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;eissn=1751-7370&amp;linkScheme=npg&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nature.com%2Fismej%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;rft.itemNum=3889&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025697,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025697}); ">
               ISME Journal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Multidisciplinary Journal of Microbial Ecology
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025701">
              <a id="link_25025701" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=allJournals&amp;rft.oclcnum=432313844&amp;issn=2150-7511&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=mbio.asm.org&amp;provider=highwire&amp;title=mBio&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;eissn=2150-7511&amp;linkScheme=highwire2&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fmbio.asm.org&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025701,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025701}); ">
               mBio
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025700">
              <a id="link_25025700" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=aph&amp;rft.oclcnum=649834915&amp;issn=0950-382X&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=ESL&amp;provider=EBSCOhost&amp;title=Molecular+Microbiology&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=ebscoh&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fsearch.ebscohost.com%2Fdirect.asp%3Fdb%3Daph%26jid%3DESL%26scope%3Dsite&amp;dbKey=aph&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025700,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025700}); ">
               Molecular Microbiology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24807910">
              <a id="link_24807910" href="http://journals.plos.org/plospathogens/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24807910,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24807910}); ">
               PLoS Pathogens
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Articles focus on bacteria, fungi, parasites, prions and viruses to advance the understanding of pathogens and how they interact with their host organisms.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21303500">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21303500">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21303500">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Microbiology Journals - Reviews (mostly)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21303500">
          <div id="boxatt21303500" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24807914">
              <a id="link_24807914" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=RAR&amp;J=ANNUREVOFMI&amp;P=EJP&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.annualreviews.org%2Floi%2Fmicro" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24807914,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24807914}); ">
               Annual Review of Microbiology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available 1996-present
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24807917">
              <a id="link_24807917" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=AFXIZ&amp;J=CURROPIINMI&amp;P=EJP&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.sciencedirect.com%2Fscience%2Fjournal%2F13695274" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24807917,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24807917}); ">
               Current Opinion in Microbiology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025695">
              <a id="link_25025695" href="http://me9qj4aj8y.search.serialssolutions.com/log?L=ME9QJ4AJ8Y&amp;D=RHF&amp;J=FEMSMICEC&amp;P=Link&amp;U=http%3A%2F%2Ffemsec.oxfordjournals.org%2Fcontent%2Fby%2Fyear" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025695,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025695}); ">
               FEMS Microbiology Reviews
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24807853">
              <a id="link_24807853" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/journal/0966842X" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24807853,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12574934}); ">
               Trends in Microbiology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Peer-reviewed review and opinion articles covering recent developments and hot topics in microbiology
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21536815">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21536815">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21536815">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Immunology Journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21536815">
          <div id="boxatt21536815" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25025705">
              <a id="link_25025705" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=aph&amp;rft.oclcnum=137343333&amp;issn=0732-0582&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=83P&amp;provider=EBSCOhost&amp;title=Annual+Review+of+Immunology&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=ebscoh&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fsearch.ebscohost.com%2Fdirect.asp%3Fdb%3Daph%26jid%3D83P%26scope%3Dsite&amp;dbKey=aph&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;localstem=https%3A%2F%2Fmuhlenberg.idm.oclc.org%2Flogin%3Furl%3D&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025705,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025705}); ">

          <h2>
           Other Journals of Note
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21536835">
          <div id="boxatt21536835" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25025723">
              <a id="link_25025723" href="http://link.worldcat.org/?rft.institution_id=2547&amp;pkgName=CellPressFree&amp;rft.oclcnum=1792038&amp;issn=0092-8674&amp;linkclass=to_article&amp;jKey=0092-8674&amp;provider=elsevier&amp;title=Cell&amp;rft.content=fulltext&amp;linkScheme=sciencedirect&amp;jHome=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cell.com%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%2Fsid%3Aoclc.org%2FWCL&amp;rft.order_by=preference&amp;linktype=best" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025723,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025723}); ">
               Cell
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available online with a one year delay or in the stacks from 1986-present at Per. 571.6c.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025715">
              <a id="link_25025715" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/direct.asp?db=aph&amp;jid=%22NAE%22&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025715,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12574996}); ">
               Nature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Access the journal Nature from 1869-1960 on microfilm (Level A of the library), 1960-present in paper journal form (Level B of the library call number 505n), or via Academic Search Complete 1997-12 months ago (selected articles only).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25025721">
              <a id="link_25025721" href="http://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25025721,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25025721}); ">

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:373px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21253104">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21253104">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21253104">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Microbes in the News and in the Blogosphere
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21253104">
          <div id="boxatt21253104" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24765144">
              <a id="link_24765144" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765144,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286621}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765534">
              <a id="link_24765534" href="http://microbe.net/microbenet-social-media/microbiology-blogs/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765534,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24765534}); ">
               Microbiology Blogroll
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A list of blogs discussing microbiology curated by J. Eisen.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765132">
              <a id="link_24765132" href="http://www.nytimes.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765132,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23576209}); ">
               New York Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Complete access to New York Times via Muhlenberg subscription. All users must register while physically on campus, using their Muhlenberg email.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765598">
              <a id="link_24765598" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765598,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286628}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765143">
              <a id="link_24765143" href="http://phylogenomics.blogspot.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765143,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24765143}); ">
               Tree of Life Blog
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Jonathan Eisen discusses many issues on his blog, including linking to articles that he thinks oversell what we know about the microbiome.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21253509">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21253509">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21253509">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21253509">
          <div id="boxatt21253509" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24765588">
              <a id="link_24765588" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765588,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A service of the National Library of Medicine, PubMed includes over 19 million citations for biomedical articles back to 1948 and links to many sites providing full text articles and other related resources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765597">
              <a id="link_24765597" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765597,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286439}); ">
               Science Direct, Health, Life, and Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences from 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765592">
              <a id="link_24765592" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765592,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286445}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765602">
              <a id="link_24765602" href="http://scholar.google.com/advanced_scholar_search?hl=en&amp;as_sdt=0,39" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765602,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286463}); ">
               Google Scholar - Biology, Medicine, and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search the Biology, Life Sciences, Environmental Sciences, Medicine, Pharmacology, and Veterinary Science sections of Google Scholar. Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24765604">
              <a id="link_24765604" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24765604,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5649189" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21253579">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21253579">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21253579">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Is my article Peer-Reviewed?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10131969">
          <p>
           Journal articles that are peer-reviewed have been critiqued by other experts before publication.
          </p>
          <p>
           To determine if an article is peer-reviewed or not, you need to check if the
           <strong>
            journal
           </strong>
           in which the article was published is peer-reviewed. You can do this by using the database
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/">
            Ulrich's web
           </a>
           . For instance, in the following citation:
          </p>
          <p>
           Barthlott, W, Wiersch, S, Čolić, Z, &amp; Koch, K 2009, 'Classification of trichome types within species of the water fern Salvinia, and ontogeny of the egg-beater trichomes',
           <i>
            Botany
           </i>
           , 87, 9, pp. 830-836.
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Botany
           </em>
           is the journal title. Using
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/">
            Ulrich's web
           </a>
           , type in the name of the journal, in this case&nbsp;
           <em>
            Botany.
           </em>
           (Do NOT enter the title of the article.) If the journal is listed as "refereed" (another word for peer-reviewed), your article is in a peer-reviewed journal. Therefore, most articles in this journal will be peer-reviewed. Exceptions to peer-reviewed articles in a peer-reviewed journal include news items, commentaries, and letters to the editor.
          </p>
          <p>
           In some databases, such as
           <em>
            Academic Search Complete
           </em>
           , you can click on the name of the journal and the database will list information about the journal, including if the journal is peer-reviewed or not. Other databases allow you to limit to see only results that are peer-reviewed. To determine if you can limit to peer-reviewed journals, look in the database's help section.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10131969" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12324431">
              <a id="link_12324431" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12324431,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Micro - Microbiology and Microbial Pathogenesis', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12324431}); ">
               Ulrich's Web
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ulrich's Directory is a database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is refereed or not (refereed is another word for peer-reviewed) on international periodicals.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21303591">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21303591">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21303591">
          <div class="bi_video">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find Background Information on a Topic
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_7" id="content21249436">
          <div id="boxatt21249436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="embedclass">
            <img src="http://corp.credoreference.com/images/logos/Credo-Black-landscape-%20147x50.png" alt="Credo Logo" />
            <form action="javascript:void;" onsubmit="javascript:return credoMultiSearchBasic(document.forms.credoMultiSearchFormBasic);" method="GET" name="credoMultiSearchFormBasic">
             <input type="hidden" name="ubasic" value="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/search/advanced/?include={0}&amp;headingsOnly=false&amp;sort=relevance" />
             <label for="qbasic">
              Search
             </label>
             <input type="text" id="qbasic" value="" size="15" />
             <input type="image" border="0" name="Submit" value="search" src="http://literati.credoreference.com/images/tools/go_button.png" alt="Submit Button" width="54" height="31" style="top:10px; position:relative;" />
             <br />
             <script type="text/javascript">
              function credoMultiSearchBasic(f){if(f.qbasic.value=='Search for...'||f.qbasic.value==''){alert('Please enter a search.');}else{var qbasic=escape(f.qbasic.value);var ubasic=f.ubasic.value.replace("{0}",qbasic);window.open(ubasic,"_blank");}return false;}
             </script>
            </form>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">

      <a href="http://www.springshare.com">
       Springshare
      </a>
      ; All rights reserved.

       <a href="/support.php">
        Report a tech support issue
       </a>
       .
      </span>
